name: Avoid Subroutines with High Fan-Out  (RPG400)
description: This rule searches all the subroutines with High Fan-Out.
output:
This report lists RPG400 Subroutines with High Fan-Out.
It provides the following information:
RPG400 Subroutine full name
rationale: The higher the number of referenced subroutines, the more difficult the maintenance and evolution as all updates in referenced Programs will have to be tested and taken into account.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of referenced subroutines
